MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KA19 postcode area of Maybole. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 2pm to repair faulty overhead equipment near Crosshill and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12.59pm on Thursday 18th February 2021.
